articles.description: Shane Warne has blasted India’s ‘ridiculous’ slow over-rate in the first ODI, claiming tardiness between overs was the reason the first innings on Friday took a whopping four hours and six minutes.
articles.content:
Indias players were fined 20 percent of their match fee for their sloppy over rate, which lead to the match finishing over an hour past its scheduled 10.10pm AEDT finish.
The ONLY place to watch eve… [+5537 chars]
